snippet: The Haxan Cloak and Robert Henke shared an electronic concert on Saturday as part of the Red Bull Music Academy Festival at Brooklyn Masonic Temple.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews electronic music performance by the Haxan Cloak and Robert Henke at Brooklyn Masonic Temple as part of Red Bull Music Academy Festival.
lead_paragraph: The Haxan Cloak and Robert Henke shared an electronic concert on Saturday as part of the Red Bull Music Academy Festival at Brooklyn Masonic Temple.

headline.seo: The Haxan Cloak and Robert Henke Play in Red Bull Festival
headline.main: An Electronic Double Bill to Shiver the Timbers
headline.print_headline: An Electronic Double Bill to Shiver the Timbers
